Text:
Sorry about the stupid large picture.  Clearly I had issues with the bayimg resizer.

7.5GB is a big file, but it's worth it.  Every other copy I've found looks like it was recorded off broadcast TV on VHS in 1981.  You won't be sorry.

You are right that there are no good versions to be found
